text:
Samuel R. Lloyd IV (November 12, 1963 – April 30, 2020) was an American actor and a capella singer. He was best known for his roles as lawyer Ted Buckland on the American comedy-drama "Scrubs" and as Albert Goldfine in "Desperate Housewives". Lloyd was born in Weston, Vermont. His uncle is actor Christopher Lloyd.
In February 2019, Lloyd was diagnosed with terminal brain cancer, which spread to his lungs, liver, jaw and spine. He died of the disease on April 30, 2020 in Los Angeles at the age of 56.
